description: This elegant and fragrant seafood stew with prawns makes a perfect dinner party main course served with crusty bread.
name: Seafood Stew with Prawns Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium onions, peeled and finely sliced
1 medium red capsicum, cored and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, non-stick pan on medium heat and cook the onions and capsicum for 10 minutes, stirring. Stir in the garlic and cook for 2 minutes.
Pour over chopped tomatoes and wine and tip in the fennel seeds. Bring to the boil then simmer for 6-8 minutes.

Add the mussels and prawns, cover and cook for 3 minutes, shaking a couple of times. Stir in the hake cover and cook for 5-6 minutes until the prawns are opaque and the mussels are open. Discard any closed mussels and serve.
